data Expr
  • = IntLit !Int
  • | NF
  • | Add Expr Expr
  • | Sub Expr Expr
  • | Neg Expr
  • | Not Expr
  • | And Expr Expr
  • | LT Expr Expr
  • | GT Expr Expr
  • | LE Expr Expr
  • | GE Expr Expr
  • | EQ Expr Expr
  • | NE Expr Expr
  • | Or Expr Expr
  • | Concat Expr Expr
  • | Match Expr String
  • | NoMatch Expr String
  • | Field Expr
  • | StringLit String
  • | If Expr Expr Expr
  • | ERE String
  • | ToUpperFn Expr
  • | ToLowerFn Expr
  • | LengthFn (Maybe Expr)
  • | MatchFn Expr String
  • | SubstrFn Expr Expr (Maybe Expr)
name: Expr SubstrFn MatchFn LengthFn ToLowerFn ToUpperFn ERE StringLit Field NoMatch Concat Or NE GE LE Neg Sub Add NF IntLit Match And If Not GT EQ LT

data TestTree
  • = forall t.IsTest t => SingleTest TestName t
  • | TestGroup TestName [TestTree]
  • | PlusTestOptions (OptionSet -> OptionSet) TestTree
  • | forall a. WithResource (ResourceSpec a) (IO a -> TestTree)
  • | AskOptions (OptionSet -> TestTree)
  • | After DependencyType Expr TestTree
name: TestTree SingleTest TestGroup PlusTestOptions WithResource AskOptions After
